summary:
Because my dragons also protect those I fight for.”

Venable on Monday challenged the subpoena, arguing that the singer and firm don’t have any relevant information and that Baldoni only seeks to “distract from the facts of the case.” Lively and Reynolds supported the firm’s bid to void the subpoena. We will imminently file motions with the court to hold these attorneys accountable for their misconduct here.”

The filling comes days after Swift was subpoenaed by Baldoni’s legal team, which declined to comment for this story. In the letter, Freedman says that a representative for Swift “addressed these inappropriate and apparently extortionate threats” in at least one written message to Lively’s legal team.
